Name: MareQuest
About the game: MareQuest! A profound experience including Mare customization, procedurally generated mares, RNG mare dialogue, and accurate mare friendship simulation! What more could you possibly want? Objectives -Create and customize your own mare -Meet cute and funny mares -Talk to cute and funny mares -Make friends with mares -Cheer up sad mares -Gift a mare her favorite food -Cuddle with mares (except Anonymous Green Mare, she doesn't like that) -Level up and save all of maredom -Mare Dance at the Poni Poni Club -Play adorable mare minigames -Solve mare puzzles -Listen to a great original mare soundtrack -Mare mare mare mare mare mare mares. I love them!
